document_data.mainbody:
amalynda, or the Whisperer, was a High Lady of the marrash in 1367 DR.
Tamalynda was a prideful marrashi who was not quick to trust others. She was a master of deceit.
In addition to being the Lotus Emperors invisible consort, Tamalynda also served as the Faceless Gods lieutenant when the Emperor was unable. The soldiers under her command served a special enforcers for their god within the highest peaks of the Land of the Yak-Men.
